name: cutlist-web-test
description: React + FastAPI chat application with Google Gemini

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && gcloud run deploy gemini-chat-api --source . --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
